description: This source file defines an Android Fragment named ControlsFragment used for controlling system volume and media playback via UI controls such as a SeekBar and a Button. It manages volume adjustments and sending media key events.

classes.name: ControlsFragment
classes.description: An Android Fragment that provides UI controls for volume adjustment and media play/pause control.
